seo_title: Vimeo Video Downloader - Download Vimeo Videos for Offline Viewing
seo_description: Download Vimeo videos to your computer for offline watching from any webpage with this browser extension. Fast downloads with original quality preserved up to 4K.
name: Vimeo Video Downloader
tagline: Download Vimeo videos to your computer for offline watching from any webpage with this browser extension
description: Vimeo Video Downloader is a browser extension that allows you to download Vimeo videos to your computer for offline watching from any webpage. Perfect for content creators backing up their portfolio, educators saving lectures and tutorials, professionals downloading training materials, and anyone wanting offline access to their favorite videos. Solves problems like paid courses disappearing, videos buffering on slow internet, and private video links expiring.
troubleshooting_instructions: Make sure you are on a page with Vimeo videos
Check that the extension is enabled and pinned to your browser
Refresh the page if video detection is not working
Ensure you have proper permissions to download the video
installation_instructions:
1. Star ‚≠ê this repository
2. Download the latest .zip file from Releases
3. Extract the ZIP file (aka double click it)
4. Open Chrome and go to chrome://extensions/
5. Enable "Developer mode" (top right toggle)
6. Click "Load unpacked" (top left button) and select the extracted folder
7. When you click on the extension for the first time, you will need to enter your email & license key associated with the extension
usage_instructions: Navigate to a Vimeo video page
Click the extension icon in your browser
Click the download button to save the video to your computer
